DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare strut coverage neointimal thickness everolimus elute ( XIENCE-V® PROMUS® stent ) biolimus A9 elute NOBORI Stent 14 month stent implantation determine coronary endothelial function everolimus elute ( XIENCE-V® PROMUS® stent ) biolimus A9 elute NOBORI Stent 14 month stent implantation use supine bicycle exercise test assess coronary vasomotor response exercise .
DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN : Imaging vasomotion Substudy : 50 consecutive patient enrol COMPARE II trial University Fribourg Medical Center undergo follow-up re-angiography 14 month index procedure assessment Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) vasomotion test . ENDPOINT SUBSTUDY ( 14 month ) : Primary endpoint imaging : percentage uncover stent strut per lesion mean neointimal thickness assess OCT. vasomotion : coronary vasomotion assess quantitative coronary angiography rest supine bicycle exercise .
DOC.criteria: Patient enrol COMPARE II trial successful stent implantation absence binary restenosis severe progression coronary artery disease 14 month followup . Patient consent undergo nonscheduled follow angiography imaging study bicycle exercise test 1 . Inability provide inform consent 2 . Inability perform supine bicycle exercise stress test 3 . Binary stent restenosis target vessel 4 . Acute Coronary Syndrome , Acute Myocardial Infarction 5 . Patients stent thrombosis follow index procedure 6 . Female childbearing potential ( age ≤ 50 year last menstruation within last 12 month ) , undergo tubal ligation , ovariectomy hysterectomy 7 . Known intolerance heparin , contrast material 8 . History bleed diathesis know coagulopathy 9 . Age ≥ 80 year 10 . Hemodynamic instability 11 . Renal failure ( creatinine clearance ≤ 40 ml/min ) 12 . OCT / IVUS technically feasible
